Content: A son of late notorious gangster Soththi Upali, 41-year old AD Lakshitha Prasanna was arrested with heroin in his possession at Thuduwamulla in Katubedda Moratuwa today. Police Media spokesman, SP Ruwan Gunesekera said that the Colombo District vice Prevention Unit arrested the suspect and seized 2 kilograms and 549 grams of heroin in a raid conducted this morning. In addition, a foreign made repeater firearm was also seized from the possession of the suspect. Meanwhile, CID is still questioning the two persons who were deported by the Dubai police. The two individuals, Mohamed Siddiq Mohamed Siyam and Lanka Sajith Perera were also arrested along with organized criminal gang leader Makandure Madush while participating in a party at a hotel in Dubai recently. At the same time, Anushka Kaushal alias Janga and Amila Sampath alias Rotambu Amila who were arrested with organized criminal gang leader Kanjipani Imran were further remanded until April 11. The suspects were produced before Matara and Morawaka Magistrate courts today.
